channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Trees and hedges overgrown, 25th June
item.description:
Trees and hedges overgrown on the cycle path next to A417. Not enough room for cyclists and walkers to pass safely. There will be an accident as the view is obscured.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Footpath hazerdous due to nettle and bramble growth, 23rd June
item.description:
Overgrown vegetation including nettles and brambles obstructing the footpath running parallel to the railway line. The footpath is between Pendil Close and the railway line. It has been overgrown for at least 3 weeks. It is hazerdous to anyone walking this route, and in some places difficult to pass through without wearing protective clothing. This route is used by school children from the local area to walk to Swindon Village Primary School.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 102 Mandarin Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned trolley, 23rd June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 Jodami Crescent, Cheltenham

item.title: Park bins not fit for purpose, 23rd June
item.description:
Regularly have to pick up and return rubbish that has been taken out of the bins by birds/animals. Please install animal proof bins. The rubbish ends up in the water and eco system.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 57b Marle Hill Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lack of bin for rubbish, 23rd June
item.description:
Despite three bins being in close proximity to the shops there needs to be a bin on the green. Perhaps relocating one of the bins would help? Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Lynworth Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath narrow due to overgrown foliage, 23rd June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Orchard Close, Cheltenham
